name: The Original Chocolate Chip Cookie Cake
author: Chris__D
summary: This is a dense cake with milk chocolate chips that makes a great snack. Kids love it.
ingredients: ¾ cup firmly packed brown sugar
2 cups milk chocolate chips (such as Guittard®)
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Stir flour, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl
Beat butter, white sugar, and brown sugar together in a bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy, 3 to 5 minutes
Beat eggs and vanilla into butter mixture until smooth
Gradually stir flour mixture into butter mixture until just combined
Stir in chocolate chips and nuts
Spread cookie batter into prepared pan
Bake in the preheated oven until golden and the cake springs back when lightly pressed, 20 to 25 minutes
